title: TFT Camera not working
body:
The general camera controls for TFT claims that if you press 1 and 2 you can cycle through each "battlefield" and view others partake in their own battles. However when I press it, all that happens is that the side of my battlefield changes (my character would move from bottom left to top right and so would my champions etc) and that's it. Even when I have lost and am spectating it does the exact same thing. When I click on the portraits as I've been told multiple times it does the exact same thing.

(I have pictures to add but I have no idea how to upload them here)
